description: Conversion and change of use of existing school buildings to residential use, and erection of a new five storey building fronting Morton Road and a new two storey building adjacent to the rear boundaries of 53-60 Halliford Street, both for residential use; a two storey rear extension to the retained caretaker's house, and alterations to Morton Road boundary.  62 residential units in total.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION:  All windows on all the buildings shall have at least a 100mm. external reveal.

REASON:  In order to ensure a satisfactory standard of appearance.
